title: Client Keeps Crashing.
body: So when I start up my client everything is fine. I can open loot and crafting easily and with no problem. But after I play a match or two if I open my loot and crafting inventory my client crashes. I tried repairing my client, and installing and re-downloading it but the problem still persists.

replies.body: I've seen issues like this happen as a result of third party apps.  If you have any running like play.tv, overlays, etc remove them to troubleshoot.  Let me know if the issue persists, and with more specifics or error messages you might be getting.  I'll be around!
I don't use third party programs or apps. I also get no error messages. I just know that every single time I open my Loot and Crafting AFTER I play a match or two my client crashes.
